page.title: 09Child's life in a big house.
page.content: Jasper is 4 years old. He lives in a big house with 7 bedrooms,2 bath rooms & a passage for the staff. It has a large garden with a swimming pool, fountains and stables.He goes to a public school. When he is thirteen he will be going to Harrow which is one of the most famous schools in England. Jasper gets up at 7'oclock. For breakfast he likes porridge & toast. Sometimes he has a swim before breakfast & wears his goggles, mask & flippers. His friends sometimes come to play with him. They play cricket. For dinner he likes Jacket potatoes. In the aftertnoon he colours pictures & then goes out with mum to collect his sisters in her Mercedes car.He goes to bed at 6.30pm. Mother runs the house with the help of a loacal woman.
